title: Progressive Era and New Deal Govt

content.question: Governmental policies enacted during the New Deal most strongly demonstrate a continuity with which of the following earlier developments?

choices.label: Progressive reformers demanded stricter regulation of the economy.
Populists attempted to get the United States to adopt the silver standard for currency.
Imperialists claimed that the United States needed to gain colonies for resources.
Nativists advocated restrictions on the number of immigrants.

content.answer: Progressive reformers demanded stricter regulation of the economy.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
